briefTitle: Dexmedetomidine or Dexmedetomidine Combined With Dexamethasone on Postoperative Nausea and Vomiting in Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Effects of Single Dose Dexmedetomidine or Dexmedetomidine Combined With Dexamethasone on Postoperative Nausea and Vomiting in Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Postoperative Nausea (Numeric Rating Scale for Nausea)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* ASA Physical status I or II female scheduled for breast conserving surgery of modified radical mastectomy.

Exclusion Criteria:

* uncontrolled cardiovascular disease
* history of chronic pain
* smoker
* previous history of steroid administraion
* neoajuvant chemotherapy
